}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *'''Intel Tri-Band Wireless-AC 18260 (18260NGW)''' (2015) • Douglas Peak :802.11ac 2x2 (867Mbps), BT 4.2, Form Factor: NGFF M.2 2230 (Key A) :802.11ad 60GHz WiGig wireless, combined with a AC 8260 (NBR) :RFEM: 10041R/10042R, abgn+ac+ad, 2x2:2, 60GHz phased array :802.11abgn+ac capabilities same as Snowfield Peak (8260) *[https://fccid.io/PD9/18260NG FCC ID: PD918260NG] (10/23/2015) • [[Intel]] W335AK1C/L333NA66 • [http://www.intel.com/content/dam/www/public/us/en/images/product/16x9/tri-band-wireless-ac17265.png.rendition.intel.web.480.270.png PCB]
:<small>'''Intel Tri-Band Wireless-AC 18260''' client delivers high-speed 60 GHz WiGig 802.11ad :wireless docking connectivity for mobile client devices like 2 in 1s, tablets, and laptops. :Combined with the dedicated '''Intel Wireless Gigabit Antenna-M 10041R''' antenna module and :'''Intel Wireless Gigabit Sink-M 13100''' wireless dock, it enables a complete WiGig wire-equivalent :user experience for wireless docking, peripherals access, and device-to-device communications</small>
{{FCC ST|08/23/2016|indexme.}}
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/tri-band-wireless-ac-wigig-18260-product-brief.html Product brief] :[http://ark.intel.com/m/products/88822/Intel-Tri-Band-Wireless-AC-18260 Specification] (ARK) :[http://listing.driveragent.com/c/vpci/Intel%20Corporation/8086/093c Windows drivers] (8086:093c)
